title: Paul Bowles, Exile, and a Bar Mitzvah
teaser:
A boy's Bar Mitzvah becomes a family battle ground; three literary pilgrims search for the author Paul Bowles in Morocco; and a novelist decides that the only way to cure her writer's block is to block out the world.  Hosted by George Dawes Green, founder of The Moth.   

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.
description: Jeffrey Solomon's divorced parents fight during his Bar Mitzvah but his older sister saves the day.Edgar Oliver takes a wild journey to Morocco to discover that he has the same bed spread as Paul Bowles. Elif Shafak is a Turkish novelist whose determination to finish a book is finally rattled by an earthquake.
